Interface Errata

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractErrata, PublishedClonedErrata, PublishedErrata, UnpublishedClonedErrata, UnpublishedErrata

    public interface Errata
    Errata - Class representation of the table rhnErrata.
